title: how can i find the 0.12.post2 wheel file for fresh installation?
body_html:
Anyone knows how to find a previous version wheel file for a fresh installation. I tried the latest 0.20 but it didn't work with my code, i.e., setting CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES in the code seems not work any more, because all jobs are cluttered on GPU 0 instead of specified ones.

Please advise 1). how to find the previous wheel file 2). alternatively how to change the GPU ID settings to make parallel jobs work.

Thanks!
body_text:

body:
Anyone knows how to find a previous version wheel file for a fresh installation. I tried the latest 0.20 but it didn't work with my code, i.e., setting CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES in the code seems not work any more, because all jobs are cluttered on GPU 0 instead of specified ones.
